SELECT DISTINCT V.V_NO, V.V_NAME FROM TB_CMB_SHP CS JOIN TB_VND V ON (CS.V_NO=CS.V_NO)
WHERE DATE_FORMAT(CS_RCV_DT, '%Y-%m-%d') >= STR_TO_DATE(#{strNowDateList[0]}, '%Y-%m-%d') AND DATE_FORMAT(CS_RCV_DT, '%Y-%m-%d') <= STR_TO_DATE(#{strNowDateList[1]}, '%Y-%m-%d')

SELECT DISTINCT E.EMP_ID, E.EMP_NAME FROM TB_CMB_SHP CS JOIN TB_EMP E ON (CS.EMP_ID=E.EMP_ID) WHERE DATE_FORMAT(CS.CS_RCV_DT, '%Y-%m-%d') = DATE_FORMAT(curdate(), '%Y-%m-%d') AND CS.CS_RCV_CHK=1 AND CS.CS_DLV_CHK=0 ORDER BY E.EMP_NAME

SELECT OI.OI_NO, I.ITM_NAME, OI.ITM_CODE , CS.CS_RCV_URLS, CS.CS_RCV_QTY, CS.CS_RCV_CHK FROM TB_CMB_SHP CS JOIN TB_ORD_ITM OI ON (CS.OI_NO = OI.OI_NO) JOIN TB_ITM I ON (I.ITM_CODE = OI.ITM_CODE) JOIN TB_RLS R ON (OI.ORD_NO = R.ORD_NO) WHERE DATE_FORMAT(CS_RCV_DT, '%Y-%m-%d') = DATE_FORMAT(curdate(), '%Y-%m-%d') AND OI.OI_NO=#{orderItemNo}

SELECT OI.ORD_NO, R.RLS_NO, I.ITM_NAME, OI.ITM_CODE , CS.CS_DLV_URLS, CS.CS_DLV_QTY , OI.OI_QTY, CS.CS_DLV_CHK FROM TB_CMB_SHP CS JOIN TB_ORD_ITM OI ON (CS.OI_NO = OI.OI_NO) JOIN TB_ITM I ON (I.ITM_CODE = OI.ITM_CODE) JOIN TB_RLS R ON (OI.ORD_NO = R.ORD_NO) WHERE DATE_FORMAT(CS_RCV_DT, '%Y-%m-%d') = DATE_FORMAT(curdate(), '%Y-%m-%d') AND OI.OI_NO=#{orderItemNo}

SELECT OI.OI_NO, I.ITM_NAME, OI.ITM_CODE , CS.CS_RCV_URLS, CS.CS_RCV_QTY, CS.CS_RCV_CHK FROM TB_CMB_SHP CS JOIN TB_ORD_ITM OI ON (CS.OI_NO = OI.OI_NO) JOIN TB_ITM I ON (I.ITM_CODE = OI.ITM_CODE) JOIN TB_RLS R ON (OI.ORD_NO = R.ORD_NO)
WHERE DATE_FORMAT(CS_RCV_DT, '%Y-%m-%d') >= STR_TO_DATE(#{startDate}, '%Y-%m-%d') AND DATE_FORMAT(CS_RCV_DT, '%Y-%m-%d') <= STR_TO_DATE(#{endDate}, '%Y-%m-%d')
ORDER BY I.ITM_NAME
